channel.title: Project Dispatcher LM
channel.description:
If you old guys out there ever heard of Shinscape,Shinscape V2,Shinscape Isle, Dispatcher beta, Dispatcher v1, Dispatcher v2 and Carom v1 then look out, because the last of my servers is here.
[size=17pt][b]Dispatcher LM[/b][/size] This project is REALLY huge.I'm using a pimpscape source , hoping that this will be a good server. Along my way of coding Shinscape, it has been great to meet Harry, owner of Harryscape and Harryscape Ultimate.As shinscape v2 released, I came to know an experienced coder, Zandia.And then, I stopped going on Mopar for some time.Not long after I returned, Dispatcher beta was released. Skill capes, specials, almost everything that a player would request was there.And then Dispatcher v1.Coded from scratch using Pimpscape once again, really helped me a lot.And then came Dispatcher v2.It was then when I finally understanded voids.V2 was a really successful server.And not far back in time, Carom v1 was released. Coding this had gave me a really hard time, but it still helped me with my coding.And now, Dispatcher LM.
Dispatcher LM will be a huge hit (hoping so).What I accomplished, and the goals will be released soon.I'll make this server compatible with the 377 client.Sometimes it really makes me wonder.Does it take a good coder to code a server like Zdiddy?No, I guess not, it's all in your mind whether how hard you make it.
[size=13pt][u][b]Dispatcher LM[/b][/u][/size]
[b]Goals : [/b] - Skill capes ( Only the part where you have to buy it in guilds for 999k lol ) - Woodcutting - Mining - Runecrafting - Agility - Fletching - Proper ancients - Magic - NPC training - New Starting location ( Not that fucking old varrock ) - Fishing - Cooking - Smithing - Fix that weird bug where I get a T2 error when hit dummies - Barrows
[b]Accomplished so far : [/b] - Skill capes (Emotes,must be 99 stats to wear,cases in emotes) - Hmm..Seems little huh.
Well you know what this means. I need coders.Experienced coders.Since i haven't accomplished that much yet, I need various types of coders. (Listed below)
[b]Safe Zone coders : [/b] - Open - Open
[b]Case coders : [/b] - Open - Open - Open - Open
[b]Skill coders : [/b] - Open - Open - Open - Open - Open - Open
[b]Starting location finder : [/b] - Open
[b]Error fixer : [/b] - Open - Open - Open
[b]Testers : [/b] [i]- Not opened for testing yet as not much has been coded.[/i] - Open - Open - Open
[b]For Safe Zone coders apply with this code : [/b] [code] Good with safezones ? Will you help with testing the server if welcomed ? Will you help advertise the server ? Proof of experience ? Why you want this position : [/code]
[b]For Case coders : [/b] [code] Good with cases ? Will you help with testing the server if welcomed ? Will you help advertise the server ? Proof of experience ? Why you want this position : [/code]
[b]For Skill coders : [/b] [code] Good with skills ? Will you help with testing the server if welcomed ? Will you help advertise the server ? Proof of experience ? Why you want this position : Which skill I want to code : [/code]
[b]For starting location finder : [/b] [i]- First apply first serve lol.[/i] [code] Good with nice areas? ? Will you help with testing the server if welcomed ? Will you help advertise the server ? Proof of experience ? Why you want this position : Which type of theme I would prefer ( for the starting area ) :[/code]
[size=13pt]Copy and paste the words in the code to a new topic in my forums (Inside the Development team section)[/size]
[b]Where to apply? Lol, Simple. Join my forums located [i][url=http://dispatcher.smfforfree3.com]Here[/i] and go to the Development Team section to apply.Please stay active on the forums as well.[/b]
[b][i][u]Much appreciation from : 1234ideclareathumbwar [ Otherwise known as Frost on my forums ][/u][/i][/b]

item.title: Project Dispatcher LM
item.dc:creator: @1234ideclareathumbwa 1234ideclareathumbwar
item.description:
@1234ideclareathumbwa wrote:

If you old guys out there ever heard of Shinscape,Shinscape V2,Shinscape Isle, Dispatcher beta, Dispatcher v1, Dispatcher v2 and Carom v1 then look out, because the last of my servers is here.

[size=17pt]Dispatcher LM[/size]
This project is REALLY huge.I’m using a pimpscape source , hoping that this will be a good server.
Along my way of coding Shinscape, it has been great to meet Harry, owner of Harryscape and Harryscape Ultimate.As shinscape v2 released, I came to know an experienced coder, Zandia.And then, I stopped going on Mopar for some time.Not long after I returned, Dispatcher beta was released. Skill capes, specials, almost everything that a player would request was there.And then Dispatcher v1.Coded from scratch using Pimpscape once again, really helped me a lot.And then came Dispatcher v2.It was then when I finally understanded voids.V2 was a really successful server.And not far back in time, Carom v1 was released. Coding this had gave me a really hard time, but it still helped me with my coding.And now, Dispatcher LM.

Dispatcher LM will be a huge hit (hoping so).What I accomplished, and the goals will be released soon.I’ll make this server compatible with the 377 client.Sometimes it really makes me wonder.Does it take a good coder to code a server like Zdiddy?No, I guess not, it’s all in your mind whether how hard you make it.

[size=13pt]Dispatcher LM[/size]

Goals :

  • Skill capes ( Only the part where you have to buy it in guilds for 999k lol )
  • Woodcutting
  • Mining
  • Runecrafting
  • Agility
  • Fletching
  • Proper ancients
  • Magic
  • NPC training
  • New Starting location ( Not that fucking old varrock )
  • Fishing
  • Cooking
  • Smithing
  • Fix that weird bug where I get a T2 error when hit dummies
  • Barrows

Accomplished so far :

  • Skill capes (Emotes,must be 99 stats to wear,cases in emotes)
  • Hmm…Seems little huh.

Well you know what this means. I need coders.Experienced coders.Since i haven’t accomplished that much yet, I need various types of coders. (Listed below)

Safe Zone coders :

  • Open
  • Open

Case coders :

  • Open
  • Open
  • Open
  • Open

Skill coders :

  • Open
  • Open
  • Open
  • Open
  • Open
  • Open

Starting location finder :

  • Open

Error fixer :

  • Open
  • Open
  • Open

Testers : - Not opened for testing yet as not much has been coded.

  • Open
  • Open
  • Open

For Safe Zone coders apply with this code : 

Good with safezones ?
Will you help with testing the server if welcomed ?
Will you help advertise the server ?

For starting location finder : - First apply first serve lol.

Good with nice areas? ? Will you help with testing the server if welcomed ? Will you help advertise the server ? Proof of experience ? Why you want this position : Which type of theme I would prefer ( for the starting area ) :

[size=13pt]Copy and paste the words in the code to a new topic in my forums (Inside the Development team section)[/size]

Where to apply? Lol, Simple. Join my forums located [url=http://dispatcher.smfforfree3.com]Here and go to the Development Team section to apply.Please stay active on the forums as well.

Much appreciation from :
1234ideclareathumbwar [ Otherwise known as Frost on my forums ]
